title: About
text:
Hello! I am a Ph.D. student at the University of Toronto’s Faculty of Information. My research focuses on understanding the experiences of Russian diasporas through the lens of political communication and media, analyzing the ways in which Kremlin-linked actors are working to develop a global “Ruski Mir.”
In addition to my work in academia, I am a Senior Analyst at Global Affairs Canada and work to support research and analysis of Kremlin disinformation narratives and their resonance within countries throughout East-Central Europe.
If you would like to know more, connect on Twitter, Linkedin, or email me at rutykorotaev [at] gmail [dot] com.
